titleStmt.title: An advertizement to all gent. souldiers, youngmen and apprentices that goe voluntary in and about the Citie of London very necessary and usefull for every valiant souldier to have one, to peruse in the time of warre.

notesStmt.note: Bidding them "be civill, modest and vertuous.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
